CustomField.defaultValue: "For ORANGE ELECTRIC Products, Lifetime-Warranty for all Switches and Sockets, Low Voltage Switchgear 10kA & SIGMA Ranges." + BR() + "5-Years Warranty for all Fan Controllers, Shaver-Outlet, Low Voltage Switchgear Alpha." + BR() + "24-Months Warranty for LED Lamps and Industrial Products. 12 to 18-Months Warranty for all CFLs. 12 Months Warranty for Home Appliances." + BR() + "The above Warranties would be applicable from Date of Invoice."
